<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
 <head>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <title></title>



<style type="text/css" data-premailer="ignore">
    /* Gmail Font Increase Fix */
    /* //////////////////////////////////// */
    .gmailfix {
      display: none;
      display: none !important;
    }

    /* Responsive Media Queries */
    /* //////////////////////////////////// */
    @media only screen and (max-width:600px) {
        img {
          max-width: 100% !important;
          max-height: auto !important;
        }

        .container,
        .container--outline {
          border: none !important;
        }

        .header__logo img {
          width: 200px !important;
          height: 38px !important;
        }

        .section-header__text {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          letter-spacing: 2px !important;
        }

        .col {
          padding-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col .content-image {
          margin-bottom: 5px !important;
        }

        .content-block {
          margin-bottom: 40px !important;
        }

        .icon--plus img {
          width: 23px !important;
          height: auto !important;
        }

        .button__default {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .button__default.button__image-margin {
          margin-bottom: 25px !important;
        }

        .hero__image-container {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .description__text   {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 27px !important;
          margin: 0 25px 20px !important;
        }

        .description__container .description__text {
          margin-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .header__nav {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .default-header__image img {
          margin-bottom: 10px !important;
        }

        .email-footer {
          padding: 20px 14px 20px 14px !important;
        }

        .footer__logo img {
          width: 105px !important;
        }

        .social-header {
          padding: 25px 0 15px !important;
          font-size: 10px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-facebook img {
          width: 13px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-instagram img {
          width: 24px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-twitter img {
          width: 30px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-pinterest img {
          width: 19px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-youtube img {
          width: 32px !important;
        }

        .social-icons a {
          margin: 0 15px !important;
        }


        .maker__divider {
          width: 80.2px !important;
          height: 11.3px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using partner header */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .header__partner-logo img {
          max-width: 100% !important;
          height: auto !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using dark hero */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .hero--dark .hero__content {
          margin-left: 27px !important;
          margin-right: 27px !important;
        }

        .hero--dark .hero__headline h1 {
          font-size: 27px !important;
        }

        .hero--dark .hero__description p {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using letter layout hero */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .hero__content--letter {
          margin: 27px 27px 0 27px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using 2017 holiday styles */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .header__logo--holiday img {
          width: 191px !important;
          height: 24px !important;
        }

        .hero__headline--holiday h1 a {
          font-size: 27px !important;
          line-height: 1.3 !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.4px !important;
        }

        .hero__ornament-top {
          width: 184px !important;
          height: 31px !important;
        }

        .hero__ornament-bottom {
          margin-top: 10px !important;
        }

        .hero__content--holiday .hero__description p {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 1.5 !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
        }

        .hero__content--holiday-image .hero__description p {
          font-size: 13px !important;
          line-height: 1.46 !important;
          letter-spacing: 1.8px !important;
        }

        .section-header--holiday {
          margin-bottom: 10px !important;
        }

        .section-header__image--holiday img {
          width: 100px !important;
          height: 48px !important;
        }

        .col--holiday.col--two-side .content-title {
          padding-left: 27px !important;
          padding-right: 27px !important;
          font-size: 12px !important;
          line-height: 1.67 !important;
          letter-spacing: 1.6px !important;
        }

        .col__ornament {
          width: 39px !important;
          height: 8px !important;
        }

        .column-container {
          margin-bottom: 40px !important;
        }

        .hero__number a {
          line-height: 30px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using two column layouts */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .col--two .content-image,
        .col--two .content-title,
        .col--two .content-description {
          margin-right: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--two.col--last .content-image,
        .col--two.col--last .content-title,
        .col--two.col--last .content-description {
          margin-right: 0 !important;
          margin-left: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--two-plus-icon img {
          padding-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col--two-side-alt {
          padding-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-container tr {
          display: block !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-container .col--two {
          width: 100% !important;
          display: block !important;
        }

        .col--two-product .content-image {
          margin-right: 0 !important;
        }

        .col--two-product img {
          width: 100% !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-description {
          margin-left: 15px !important;
          margin-top: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-description a {
          font-size: 15px !important;
        }

        .content-description a {
          line-height: 1.4 !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using four column layouts */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .col--four {
          width: 50% !important;
          padding-bottom: 0 !important;
          margin-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col__space--four {
          display: none !important;
        }

        .col--four .content-image,
        .col--four .content-title,
        .col--four .content-description {
          margin-right: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--four.col--last .content-image,
        .col--four.col--last .content-title,
        .col--four.col--last .content-description {
          margin-right: 0 !important;
          margin-left: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--four-side {
          width: 100% !important;
          padding-bottom: 0 !important;
          margin-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col__inner--four-side,
        .col--last .col__inner--four-side {
          padding: 0 !important;
        }

        .col--four-side .content-image {
          margin-right: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--four-side .content-title,
        .col--four-side .content-description {
          margin: 0 7px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using recipe block */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */

        .recipe__block .default-header__text {
          max-width: 344px !important;
          display: block !important;
          margin: 0 auto !important;
        }

        .recipe__block .content-title {
          padding: 0 18px !important;
          font-size: 15px !important;
        }

        .recipe__block .content-link a {
          font-size: 12px !important;
        }

        .recipe__block .content-image {
          margin-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

5252692.content_html:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
 <head>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <title></title>



<style type="text/css" data-premailer="ignore">
    /* Gmail Font Increase Fix */
    /* //////////////////////////////////// */
    .gmailfix {
      display: none;
      display: none !important;
    }

    /* Responsive Media Queries */
    /* //////////////////////////////////// */
    @media only screen and (max-width:600px) {
        img {
          max-width: 100% !important;
          max-height: auto !important;
        }

        .container,
        .container--outline {
          border: none !important;
        }

        .header__logo img {
          width: 200px !important;
          height: 38px !important;
        }

        .section-header__text {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          letter-spacing: 2px !important;
        }

        .col {
          padding-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col .content-image {
          margin-bottom: 5px !important;
        }

        .content-block {
          margin-bottom: 40px !important;
        }

        .icon--plus img {
          width: 23px !important;
          height: auto !important;
        }

        .button__default {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .button__default.button__image-margin {
          margin-bottom: 25px !important;
        }

        .hero__image-container {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .description__text   {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 27px !important;
          margin: 0 25px 20px !important;
        }

        .description__container .description__text {
          margin-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .header__nav {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .default-header__image img {
          margin-bottom: 10px !important;
        }

        .email-footer {
          padding: 20px 14px 20px 14px !important;
        }

        .footer__logo img {
          width: 105px !important;
        }

        .social-header {
          padding: 25px 0 15px !important;
          font-size: 10px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-facebook img {
          width: 13px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-instagram img {
          width: 24px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-twitter img {
          width: 30px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-pinterest img {
          width: 19px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-youtube img {
          width: 32px !important;
        }

        .social-icons a {
          margin: 0 15px !important;
        }


        .maker__divider {
          width: 80.2px !important;
          height: 11.3px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using partner header */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .header__partner-logo img {
          max-width: 100% !important;
          height: auto !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using dark hero */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .hero--dark .hero__content {
          margin-left: 27px !important;
          margin-right: 27px !important;
        }

        .hero--dark .hero__headline h1 {
          font-size: 27px !important;
        }

        .hero--dark .hero__description p {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using letter layout hero */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .hero__content--letter {
          margin: 27px 27px 0 27px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using 2017 holiday styles */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .header__logo--holiday img {
          width: 191px !important;
          height: 24px !important;
        }

        .hero__headline--holiday h1 a {
          font-size: 27px !important;
          line-height: 1.3 !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.4px !important;
        }

        .hero__ornament-top {
          width: 184px !important;
          height: 31px !important;
        }

        .hero__ornament-bottom {
          margin-top: 10px !important;
        }

        .hero__content--holiday .hero__description p {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 1.5 !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
        }

        .hero__content--holiday-image .hero__description p {
          font-size: 13px !important;
          line-height: 1.46 !important;
          letter-spacing: 1.8px !important;
        }

        .section-header--holiday {
          margin-bottom: 10px !important;
        }

        .section-header__image--holiday img {
          width: 100px !important;
          height: 48px !important;
        }

        .col--holiday.col--two-side .content-title {
          padding-left: 27px !important;
          padding-right: 27px !important;
          font-size: 12px !important;
          line-height: 1.67 !important;
          letter-spacing: 1.6px !important;
        }

        .col__ornament {
          width: 39px !important;
          height: 8px !important;
        }

        .column-container {
          margin-bottom: 40px !important;
        }

        .hero__number a {
          line-height: 30px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using two column layouts */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .col--two .content-image,
        .col--two .content-title,
        .col--two .content-description {
          margin-right: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--two.col--last .content-image,
        .col--two.col--last .content-title,
        .col--two.col--last .content-description {
          margin-right: 0 !important;
          margin-left: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--two-plus-icon img {
          padding-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col--two-side-alt {
          padding-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-container tr {
          display: block !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-container .col--two {
          width: 100% !important;
          display: block !important;
        }

        .col--two-product .content-image {
          margin-right: 0 !important;
        }

        .col--two-product img {
          width: 100% !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-description {
          margin-left: 15px !important;
          margin-top: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-description a {
          font-size: 15px !important;
        }

        .content-description a {
          line-height: 1.4 !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using four column layouts */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .col--four {
          width: 50% !important;
          padding-bottom: 0 !important;
          margin-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col__space--four {
          display: none !important;
        }

        .col--four .content-image,
        .col--four .content-title,

5252694.content_html:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
 <head>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <title></title>



<style type="text/css" data-premailer="ignore">
    /* Gmail Font Increase Fix */
    /* //////////////////////////////////// */
    .gmailfix {
      display: none;
      display: none !important;
    }

    /* Responsive Media Queries */
    /* //////////////////////////////////// */
    @media only screen and (max-width:600px) {
        img {
          max-width: 100% !important;
          max-height: auto !important;
        }

        .container,
        .container--outline {
          border: none !important;
        }

        .header__logo img {
          width: 200px !important;
          height: 38px !important;
        }

        .section-header__text {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          letter-spacing: 2px !important;
        }

        .col {
          padding-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col .content-image {
          margin-bottom: 5px !important;
        }

        .content-block {
          margin-bottom: 40px !important;
        }

        .icon--plus img {
          width: 23px !important;
          height: auto !important;
        }

        .button__default {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .button__default.button__image-margin {
          margin-bottom: 25px !important;
        }

        .hero__image-container {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .description__text   {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 27px !important;
          margin: 0 25px 20px !important;
        }

        .description__container .description__text {
          margin-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .header__nav {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .default-header__image img {
          margin-bottom: 10px !important;
        }

        .email-footer {
          padding: 20px 14px 20px 14px !important;
        }

        .footer__logo img {
          width: 105px !important;
        }

        .social-header {
          padding: 25px 0 15px !important;
          font-size: 10px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-facebook img {
          width: 13px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-instagram img {
          width: 24px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-twitter img {
          width: 30px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-pinterest img {
          width: 19px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-youtube img {
          width: 32px !important;
        }

        .social-icons a {
          margin: 0 15px !important;
        }


        .maker__divider {
          width: 80.2px !important;
          height: 11.3px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using partner header */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .header__partner-logo img {
          max-width: 100% !important;
          height: auto !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using dark hero */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .hero--dark .hero__content {
          margin-left: 27px !important;
          margin-right: 27px !important;
        }

        .hero--dark .hero__headline h1 {
          font-size: 27px !important;
        }

        .hero--dark .hero__description p {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using letter layout hero */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .hero__content--letter {
          margin: 27px 27px 0 27px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using 2017 holiday styles */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .header__logo--holiday img {
          width: 191px !important;
          height: 24px !important;
        }

        .hero__headline--holiday h1 a {
          font-size: 27px !important;
          line-height: 1.3 !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.4px !important;
        }

        .hero__ornament-top {
          width: 184px !important;
          height: 31px !important;
        }

        .hero__ornament-bottom {
          margin-top: 10px !important;
        }

        .hero__content--holiday .hero__description p {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 1.5 !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
        }

        .hero__content--holiday-image .hero__description p {
          font-size: 13px !important;
          line-height: 1.46 !important;
          letter-spacing: 1.8px !important;
        }

        .section-header--holiday {
          margin-bottom: 10px !important;
        }

        .section-header__image--holiday img {
          width: 100px !important;
          height: 48px !important;
        }

        .col--holiday.col--two-side .content-title {
          padding-left: 27px !important;
          padding-right: 27px !important;
          font-size: 12px !important;
          line-height: 1.67 !important;
          letter-spacing: 1.6px !important;
        }

        .col__ornament {
          width: 39px !important;
          height: 8px !important;
        }

        .column-container {
          margin-bottom: 40px !important;
        }

        .hero__number a {
          line-height: 30px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using two column layouts */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .col--two .content-image,
        .col--two .content-title,
        .col--two .content-description {
          margin-right: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--two.col--last .content-image,
        .col--two.col--last .content-title,
        .col--two.col--last .content-description {
          margin-right: 0 !important;
          margin-left: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--two-plus-icon img {
          padding-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col--two-side-alt {
          padding-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-container tr {
          display: block !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-container .col--two {
          width: 100% !important;
          display: block !important;
        }

        .col--two-product .content-image {
          margin-right: 0 !important;
        }

        .col--two-product img {
          width: 100% !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-description {
          margin-left: 15px !important;
          margin-top: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-description a {
          font-size: 15px !important;
        }

5252709.content_html:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
 <head>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <title></title>



<style type="text/css" data-premailer="ignore">
    /* Gmail Font Increase Fix */
    /* //////////////////////////////////// */
    .gmailfix {
      display: none;
      display: none !important;
    }

    /* Responsive Media Queries */
    /* //////////////////////////////////// */
    @media only screen and (max-width:600px) {
        img {
          max-width: 100% !important;
          max-height: auto !important;
        }

        .container,
        .container--outline {
          border: none !important;
        }

        .header__logo img {
          width: 200px !important;
          height: 38px !important;
        }

        .section-header__text {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          letter-spacing: 2px !important;
        }

        .col {
          padding-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col .content-image {
          margin-bottom: 5px !important;
        }

        .content-block {
          margin-bottom: 40px !important;
        }

        .icon--plus img {
          width: 23px !important;
          height: auto !important;
        }

        .button__default {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .button__default.button__image-margin {
          margin-bottom: 25px !important;
        }

        .hero__image-container {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .description__text   {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 27px !important;
          margin: 0 25px 20px !important;
        }

        .description__container .description__text {
          margin-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .header__nav {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .default-header__image img {
          margin-bottom: 10px !important;
        }

        .email-footer {
          padding: 20px 14px 20px 14px !important;
        }

        .footer__logo img {
          width: 105px !important;
        }

        .social-header {
          padding: 25px 0 15px !important;
          font-size: 10px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-facebook img {
          width: 13px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-instagram img {
          width: 24px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-twitter img {
          width: 30px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-pinterest img {
          width: 19px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-youtube img {
          width: 32px !important;
        }

        .social-icons a {
          margin: 0 15px !important;
        }


        .maker__divider {
          width: 80.2px !important;
          height: 11.3px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using partner header */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .header__partner-logo img {
          max-width: 100% !important;
          height: auto !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using dark hero */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .hero--dark .hero__content {
          margin-left: 27px !important;
          margin-right: 27px !important;
        }

        .hero--dark .hero__headline h1 {
          font-size: 27px !important;
        }

        .hero--dark .hero__description p {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using letter layout hero */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .hero__content--letter {
          margin: 27px 27px 0 27px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using 2017 holiday styles */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .header__logo--holiday img {
          width: 191px !important;
          height: 24px !important;
        }

        .hero__headline--holiday h1 a {
          font-size: 27px !important;
          line-height: 1.3 !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.4px !important;
        }

        .hero__ornament-top {
          width: 184px !important;
          height: 31px !important;
        }

        .hero__ornament-bottom {
          margin-top: 10px !important;
        }

        .hero__content--holiday .hero__description p {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 1.5 !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
        }

        .hero__content--holiday-image .hero__description p {
          font-size: 13px !important;
          line-height: 1.46 !important;
          letter-spacing: 1.8px !important;
        }

        .section-header--holiday {
          margin-bottom: 10px !important;
        }

        .section-header__image--holiday img {
          width: 100px !important;
          height: 48px !important;
        }

        .col--holiday.col--two-side .content-title {
          padding-left: 27px !important;
          padding-right: 27px !important;
          font-size: 12px !important;
          line-height: 1.67 !important;
          letter-spacing: 1.6px !important;
        }

        .col__ornament {
          width: 39px !important;
          height: 8px !important;
        }

        .column-container {
          margin-bottom: 40px !important;
        }

        .hero__number a {
          line-height: 30px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using two column layouts */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .col--two .content-image,
        .col--two .content-title,
        .col--two .content-description {
          margin-right: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--two.col--last .content-image,
        .col--two.col--last .content-title,
        .col--two.col--last .content-description {
          margin-right: 0 !important;
          margin-left: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--two-plus-icon img {
          padding-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col--two-side-alt {
          padding-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-container tr {
          display: block !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-container .col--two {
          width: 100% !important;
          display: block !important;
        }

        .col--two-product .content-image {
          margin-right: 0 !important;
        }

        .col--two-product img {
          width: 100% !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-description {
          margin-left: 15px !important;
          margin-top: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-description a {
          font-size: 15px !important;
        }

        .content-description a {
          line-height: 1.4 !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using four column layouts */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .col--four {
          width: 50% !important;
          padding-bottom: 0 !important;
          margin-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col__space--four {
          display: none !important;
        }

        .col--four .content-image,
        .col--four .content-title,
        .col--four .content-description {
          margin-right: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--four.col--last .content-image,
        .col--four.col--last .content-title,
        .col--four.col--last .content-description {
          margin-right: 0 !important;
          margin-left: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--four-side {
          width: 100% !important;
          padding-bottom: 0 !important;
          margin-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col__inner--four-side,
        .col--last .col__inner--four-side {
          padding: 0 !important;
        }

        .col--four-side .content-image {
          margin-right: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--four-side .content-title,
        .col--four-side .content-description {
          margin: 0 7px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using recipe block */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */

        .recipe__block .default-header__text {
          max-width: 344px !important;
          display: block !important;
          margin: 0 auto !important;
        }

        .recipe__block .content-title {
          padding: 0 18px !important;
          font-size: 15px !important;
        }

        .recipe__block .content-link a {
          font-size: 12px !important;
        }

        .recipe__block .content-image {
          margin-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .recipe__block .col__ornament {
          width: 52.2px !important;
          height: 11.2px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using quote block */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .quote {
          padding: 27px 35px !important;
        }

        .quote__marks {
          padding-bottom: 12px !important;
        }

        .quote__marks--bottom {
          padding: 12px 0 0 0 !important;
        }

        .quote__marks img {
          width: 18px !important;
          height: 13px !important;
        }

        .quote__text {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 27px !important;
        }

        .quote__source {
          font-size: 13px !important;
          letter-spacing: 2.4px !important;
          line-height: 16px !important;
          padding-top: 17px !important;
        }

        .quote__source-title {
          font-size: 13px !important;
          line-height: 15px !important;
        }

        .quote__hotline-header {
          font-size: 13px !important;
          letter-spacing: 2.4px !important;
          padding-bottom: 20px !important;
        }

        .quote__block {
          width: auto !important;
          margin: 0 16px !important;
        }

        .quote__single {
          width: auto !important;
        }

        .quote__single,
        .quote__bio {
          margin: 0 16px 40px 16px !important;
        }

        .quote__single .quote,
        .quote__hotline {
          padding: 25px 30px !important;
        }

        .quote__hotline-link {
          font-size: 13px !important;
        }

        .quote__bio-container {
          display: block !important;
          width: 100% !important;
          margin-bottom: 15px !important;
          padding: 0 !important;
        }

        .quote__bio {
          width: auto !important;
        }

        .quote__text-side {
          display: block !important;
          border-left: none !important;
          width: 100% !important;
          padding: 0 !important;
          text-align: center !important;
        }

        .quote__attribution {
          padding: 25px 30px !important;
        }

        .quote__button-margin {
          margin-bottom: 25px !important;
        }


        /* Keep if Using Headlines */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */

        .headline__large {
          font-size: 32px !important;
          line-height: 41px !important;
          margin: 0px 16px 10px 16px !important;
        }

        .headline__large-margin {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .headline__medium {
          font-size: 26px !important;
          line-height: 32px !important;
          margin: 0px 16px 10px 16px!important;
        }

        .article__header-margin {
          margin-bottom: 17px !important;
        }

        .subtext__medium {
          width: 330px !important;
          font-size: 14px !important;
          line-height: 20px !important;
          letter-spacing: 2.2px !important;
          margin-bottom: 10px !important;
        }

        .subtext__medium-margin {
          margin-bottom: 20px !important;
        }

        .subtext__small {
          max-width: 315px;
          font-size: 11.5px !important;
        }

        .footer__banner img {
          width: 92% !important;
        }

        .headline__medium-margin {
          margin-bottom: 17px !important;
        }

        /* Kepp if Using Product Two Column */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */

        .product-header__text {
          font-size: 11.5px !important;
          letter-spacing: 1.8px !important;
          display: block !important;
          margin: 0 auto !important;
          max-width: 315px !important;
        }

        .product-header__subtext {
          padding-top: 9px !important;
        }

        .product-header__subtext {
          max-width: 344px !important;
          display: block;
          margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .default-header {
          margin-bottom: 17px !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-container {
          margin: 0 16px !important;
        }

        .col--two-product {
          margin-bottom: 10px;
        }

        .col--two .col--two-product .content-image {
          margin-left: 0 !important;
        }

        .col--last .hero__number {
          padding-left: 0 !important;
        }

        /* Three Columns */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .col--three {
          min-width: 109px !important;
        }

        .col__space--three {
          width: 8px !important;
          min-width: 8px !important;
        }

        .col--two-header .col {
          padding-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .col--three-header .col {
          padding-bottom: 0 !important;
        }



        .supporting__article {
          margin-bottom: 0px !important;
        }

        .supporting__article .button__default {
          margin-bottom: 25px !important;
        }

        .supporting__article .full-image {
          margin: 0 16px !important;
        }

        .supporting__article .description__text {
          font-size: 15px !important;
          line-height: 22px !important;
        }

        /* Letter */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .letter__padding td {
          padding: 0 30px !important;
        }

        .letter__container h1 {
          font-size: 32px !important;
          line-height: 41px !important;
        }

        .letter__container p {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 27px !important;
        }

        .letter__container {
          margin-bottom: 0px !important;
        }

        /* Article Two Column*/
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */

        .article__two-column {
          margin: 0 14px 40px 14px !important;
        }

        .article__two-column .col {
          padding-bottom: 20px !important;
        }

        .leaderboard-ad {
          max-width: 343px !important;
        }

        /* Roundup */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .roundup .button__default {
          margin-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .roundup .hero__link {
          margin-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .roundup .hero__headline h1 {
          font-size: 20px !important;
          line-height: 1.35 !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
          margin-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .roundup .hero__number {
          margin-top: 15px !important;
        }

        .roundup .hero__number a {
          font-size: 32px !important;
          line-height: 1.5 !important;
        }

        .roundup-divider {
          max-width: 300px !important;
          border-bottom-width: 40px !important;
        }

        /* Collection */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */

        .collection__backboard {
          width: auto !important;
          max-height: 327px !important;
        }

        .collection__backboard table {
          min-width: 24px !important;
        }

        .collection-image img {
          width: 327px !important;
        }

        .collection__text {
          font-size: 18px !important;
          line-height: 25px !important;
          padding: 20px 24px 20px 60px !important;
        }

        .collection__left {
          padding: 20px 60px 20px 24px !important;

5252719.content_html:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
 <head>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <title></title>



<style type="text/css" data-premailer="ignore">
    /* Gmail Font Increase Fix */
    /* //////////////////////////////////// */
    .gmailfix {
      display: none;
      display: none !important;
    }

    /* Responsive Media Queries */
    /* //////////////////////////////////// */
    @media only screen and (max-width:600px) {
        img {
          max-width: 100% !important;
          max-height: auto !important;
        }

        .container,
        .container--outline {
          border: none !important;
        }

        .header__logo img {
          width: 200px !important;
          height: 38px !important;
        }

        .section-header__text {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          letter-spacing: 2px !important;
        }

        .col {
          padding-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col .content-image {
          margin-bottom: 5px !important;
        }

        .content-block {
          margin-bottom: 40px !important;
        }

        .icon--plus img {
          width: 23px !important;
          height: auto !important;
        }

        .button__default {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .button__default.button__image-margin {
          margin-bottom: 25px !important;
        }

        .hero__image-container {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .description__text   {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 27px !important;
          margin: 0 25px 20px !important;
        }

        .description__container .description__text {
          margin-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .header__nav {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .default-header__image img {
          margin-bottom: 10px !important;
        }

        .email-footer {
          padding: 20px 14px 20px 14px !important;
        }

        .footer__logo img {
          width: 105px !important;
        }

        .social-header {
          padding: 25px 0 15px !important;
          font-size: 10px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-facebook img {
          width: 13px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-instagram img {
          width: 24px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-twitter img {
          width: 30px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-pinterest img {
          width: 19px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-youtube img {
          width: 32px !important;
        }

        .social-icons a {
          margin: 0 15px !important;
        }


        .maker__divider {
          width: 80.2px !important;
          height: 11.3px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using partner header */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .header__partner-logo img {
          max-width: 100% !important;
          height: auto !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using dark hero */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .hero--dark .hero__content {
          margin-left: 27px !important;
          margin-right: 27px !important;
        }

        .hero--dark .hero__headline h1 {
          font-size: 27px !important;
        }

        .hero--dark .hero__description p {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using letter layout hero */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .hero__content--letter {
          margin: 27px 27px 0 27px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using 2017 holiday styles */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .header__logo--holiday img {
          width: 191px !important;
          height: 24px !important;
        }

        .hero__headline--holiday h1 a {
          font-size: 27px !important;
          line-height: 1.3 !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.4px !important;
        }

        .hero__ornament-top {
          width: 184px !important;
          height: 31px !important;
        }

        .hero__ornament-bottom {
          margin-top: 10px !important;
        }

        .hero__content--holiday .hero__description p {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 1.5 !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
        }

        .hero__content--holiday-image .hero__description p {
          font-size: 13px !important;
          line-height: 1.46 !important;
          letter-spacing: 1.8px !important;
        }

        .section-header--holiday {
          margin-bottom: 10px !important;
        }

        .section-header__image--holiday img {
          width: 100px !important;
          height: 48px !important;
        }

        .col--holiday.col--two-side .content-title {
          padding-left: 27px !important;
          padding-right: 27px !important;
          font-size: 12px !important;
          line-height: 1.67 !important;
          letter-spacing: 1.6px !important;
        }

        .col__ornament {
          width: 39px !important;
          height: 8px !important;
        }

        .column-container {
          margin-bottom: 40px !important;
        }

        .hero__number a {
          line-height: 30px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using two column layouts */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .col--two .content-image,
        .col--two .content-title,
        .col--two .content-description {
          margin-right: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--two.col--last .content-image,
        .col--two.col--last .content-title,
        .col--two.col--last .content-description {
          margin-right: 0 !important;
          margin-left: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--two-plus-icon img {
          padding-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col--two-side-alt {
          padding-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-container tr {
          display: block !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-container .col--two {
          width: 100% !important;
          display: block !important;
        }

        .col--two-product .content-image {
          margin-right: 0 !important;
        }

        .col--two-product img {
          width: 100% !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-description {
          margin-left: 15px !important;
          margin-top: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-description a {
          font-size: 15px !important;
        }

        .content-description a {
          line-height: 1.4 !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using four column layouts */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .col--four {
          width: 50% !important;
          padding-bottom: 0 !important;
          margin-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col__space--four {
          display: none !important;
        }

        .col--four .content-image,
        .col--four .content-title,
        .col--four .content-description {
          margin-right: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--four.col--last .content-image,
        .col--four.col--last .content-title,
        .col--four.col--last .content-description {
          margin-right: 0 !important;
          margin-left: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--four-side {
          width: 100% !important;
          padding-bottom: 0 !important;
          margin-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col__inner--four-side,
        .col--last .col__inner--four-side {
          padding: 0 !important;
        }

        .col--four-side .content-image {
          margin-right: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--four-side .content-title,
        .col--four-side .content-description {
          margin: 0 7px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using recipe block */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */

        .recipe__block .default-header__text {
          max-width: 344px !important;
          display: block !important;
          margin: 0 auto !important;
        }

        .recipe__block .content-title {
          padding: 0 18px !important;
          font-size: 15px !important;
        }

        .recipe__block .content-link a {
          font-size: 12px !important;
        }

        .recipe__block .content-image {
          margin-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .recipe__block .col__ornament {
          width: 52.2px !important;
          height: 11.2px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using quote block */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .quote {
          padding: 27px 35px !important;
        }

        .quote__marks {
          padding-bottom: 12px !important;
        }

        .quote__marks--bottom {
          padding: 12px 0 0 0 !important;
        }

        .quote__marks img {
          width: 18px !important;
          height: 13px !important;
        }

        .quote__text {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 27px !important;
        }

        .quote__source {
          font-size: 13px !important;
          letter-spacing: 2.4px !important;
          line-height: 16px !important;
          padding-top: 17px !important;
        }

        .quote__source-title {
          font-size: 13px !important;
          line-height: 15px !important;
        }

        .quote__hotline-header {
          font-size: 13px !important;
          letter-spacing: 2.4px !important;
          padding-bottom: 20px !important;
        }

        .quote__block {
          width: auto !important;
          margin: 0 16px !important;
        }

        .quote__single {
          width: auto !important;
        }

        .quote__single,
        .quote__bio {
          margin: 0 16px 40px 16px !important;
        }

        .quote__single .quote,
        .quote__hotline {
          padding: 25px 30px !important;
        }

        .quote__hotline-link {
          font-size: 13px !important;
        }

        .quote__bio-container {
          display: block !important;
          width: 100% !important;
          margin-bottom: 15px !important;
          padding: 0 !important;
        }

        .quote__bio {
          width: auto !important;
        }

        .quote__text-side {
          display: block !important;
          border-left: none !important;
          width: 100% !important;
          padding: 0 !important;
          text-align: center !important;
        }

        .quote__attribution {
          padding: 25px 30px !important;
        }

        .quote__button-margin {
          margin-bottom: 25px !important;
        }


        /* Keep if Using Headlines */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */

        .headline__large {
          font-size: 32px !important;
          line-height: 41px !important;
          margin: 0px 16px 10px 16px !important;
        }

        .headline__large-margin {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .headline__medium {
          font-size: 26px !important;
          line-height: 32px !important;
          margin: 0px 16px 10px 16px!important;
        }

        .article__header-margin {
          margin-bottom: 17px !important;
        }

        .subtext__medium {
          width: 330px !important;
          font-size: 14px !important;
          line-height: 20px !important;
          letter-spacing: 2.2px !important;
          margin-bottom: 10px !important;
        }

        .subtext__medium-margin {
          margin-bottom: 20px !important;
        }

        .subtext__small {
          max-width: 315px;
          font-size: 11.5px !important;
        }

        .footer__banner img {
          width: 92% !important;
        }

        .headline__medium-margin {
          margin-bottom: 17px !important;
        }

        /* Kepp if Using Product Two Column */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */

        .product-header__text {
          font-size: 11.5px !important;
          letter-spacing: 1.8px !important;
          display: block !important;
          margin: 0 auto !important;
          max-width: 315px !important;
        }

        .product-header__subtext {
          padding-top: 9px !important;
        }

        .product-header__subtext {
          max-width: 344px !important;
          display: block;
          margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .default-header {
          margin-bottom: 17px !important;
        }

        .col--two-product-container {
          margin: 0 16px !important;
        }

        .col--two-product {
          margin-bottom: 10px;
        }

        .col--two .col--two-product .content-image {
          margin-left: 0 !important;
        }

        .col--last .hero__number {
          padding-left: 0 !important;
        }

        /* Three Columns */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .col--three {
          min-width: 109px !important;
        }

        .col__space--three {
          width: 8px !important;
          min-width: 8px !important;
        }

        .col--two-header .col {
          padding-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .col--three-header .col {
          padding-bottom: 0 !important;
        }



        .supporting__article {
          margin-bottom: 0px !important;
        }

        .supporting__article .button__default {
          margin-bottom: 25px !important;
        }

        .supporting__article .full-image {
          margin: 0 16px !important;
        }

        .supporting__article .description__text {
          font-size: 15px !important;
          line-height: 22px !important;
        }

        /* Letter */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .letter__padding td {
          padding: 0 30px !important;
        }

        .letter__container h1 {
          font-size: 32px !important;
          line-height: 41px !important;
        }

        .letter__container p {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 27px !important;
        }

        .letter__container {
          margin-bottom: 0px !important;
        }

        /* Article Two Column*/
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */

        .article__two-column {
          margin: 0 14px 40px 14px !important;
        }

        .article__two-column .col {
          padding-bottom: 20px !important;
        }

        .leaderboard-ad {
          max-width: 343px !important;
        }

        /* Roundup */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .roundup .button__default {
          margin-bottom: 0 !important;

            <td width="50%" valign="top" class="col col--two col--last" style="border-collapse: collapse; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; padding: 0 0 30px; width: 50%">
              <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse: collapse; mso-table-lspace: 0pt; mso-table-rspace: 0pt; width: 100%">
                  <tr>
                    <td style="border-collapse: collapse; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; padding: 0">
                      <div class="content-image" style="margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; margin-right: 0">
                        <a target="_blank" href="https://food52.com/shop/products/5180" style="color: #666; display: block; margin: 0; text-align: center; text-decoration: none"><img width="270" alt="Nordic Sheepskin" src="https://media.sailthru.com/3sg/1k2/9/o/5ba908b53b6d9.jpg" style="-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic; border: none; display: block; height: auto !important; max-width: 100%; outline: none; text-decoration: none" /></a>
                      </div>
                    </td>
                  </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td style="border-collapse: collapse; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; padding: 0">
                      <div class="content-description" style="font-size: 14px; font-weight: 300; letter-spacing: 0.7px; line-height: 1.43; margin-left: 10px; margin-right: 0; text-align: center" align="center">
                        <a target="_blank" href="https://food52.com/shop/products/5180" style="color: #555; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: 0.8px; line-height: 1.5; text-decoration: none">Nordic Sheepskin</a>
                      </div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
              </table>
            </td>
          </tr>
        </table>
      </td>
    </tr>
  </table>
</div>
<!-- /6 Product w/ Header -->
				  
				  <!-- Default Divider -->
<table class="divider-default" width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" align="center" style="border-collapse: collapse; mso-table-lspace: 0pt; mso-table-rspace: 0pt; text-align: center; width: 100%">

<!-- /Divider -->

<!-- Medium Headline Text Block -->
<table align="center" class="headline__text" style="border-collapse: collapse; color: #555555; font-family: Georgia, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 38px; line-height: 47px; mso-table-lspace: 0pt; mso-table-rspace: 0pt; text-align: center; width: 100%">

Must be logged into a registered Food52 account, and discount is valid on second order placed while logged into that account, only. Valid in the U.S. and on in stock items only. Cannot be redeemed for cash, combined with other offers or applied to previous orders. Offer excludes Ballarini, Blue Bottle Coffee, Byers Choice, Demeyere, Frog Hollow Farm, Food52 x Elsie Green Furniture, Food52 Gift and E-Gift Cards, Food52 x Simon Pearce, Miyabi, Mueller, Simon Pearce, Snowe, Staub, Uashmama, select Coppermill Kitchen pieces, and ZWILLING J.A. Henckels. Offer excludes all subscriptions. To redeem, enter promotional code GREATESTHITS at checkout.
</span> <br/> <br/>

5254291.name: automated_editorial_email_template
5254291.content_html:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
 <head>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <title></title>



<style type="text/css" data-premailer="ignore">
    /* Gmail Font Increase Fix */
    /* //////////////////////////////////// */
    .gmailfix {
      display: none;
      display: none !important;
    }

    /* Responsive Media Queries */
    /* //////////////////////////////////// */
    @media only screen and (max-width:600px) {
        img {
          max-width: 100% !important;
          max-height: auto !important;
        }

        .container,
        .container--outline {
          border: none !important;
        }

        .header__logo img {
          width: 200px !important;
          height: 38px !important;
        }

        .section-header__text {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          letter-spacing: 2px !important;
        }

        .col {
          padding-bottom: 15px !important;
        }

        .col .content-image {
          margin-bottom: 5px !important;
        }

        .content-block {
          margin-bottom: 40px !important;
        }

        .icon--plus img {
          width: 23px !important;
          height: auto !important;
        }

        .button__default {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .button__default.button__image-margin {
          margin-bottom: 25px !important;
        }

        .hero__image-container {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .description__text   {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 27px !important;
          margin: 0 25px 20px !important;
        }

        .description__container .description__text {
          margin-bottom: 0 !important;
        }

        .header__nav {
          margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }

        .default-header__image img {
          margin-bottom: 10px !important;
        }

        .email-footer {
          padding: 20px 14px 20px 14px !important;
        }

        .footer__logo img {
          width: 105px !important;
        }

        .social-header {
          padding: 25px 0 15px !important;
          font-size: 10px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-facebook img {
          width: 13px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-instagram img {
          width: 24px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-twitter img {
          width: 30px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-pinterest img {
          width: 19px !important;
        }

        .social-icons .social-youtube img {
          width: 32px !important;
        }

        .social-icons a {
          margin: 0 15px !important;
        }


        .maker__divider {
          width: 80.2px !important;
          height: 11.3px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using partner header */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .header__partner-logo img {
          max-width: 100% !important;
          height: auto !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using dark hero */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .hero--dark .hero__content {
          margin-left: 27px !important;
          margin-right: 27px !important;
        }

        .hero--dark .hero__headline h1 {
          font-size: 27px !important;
        }

        .hero--dark .hero__description p {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using letter layout hero */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .hero__content--letter {
          margin: 27px 27px 0 27px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using 2017 holiday styles */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .header__logo--holiday img {
          width: 191px !important;
          height: 24px !important;
        }

        .hero__headline--holiday h1 a {
          font-size: 27px !important;
          line-height: 1.3 !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.4px !important;
        }

        .hero__ornament-top {
          width: 184px !important;
          height: 31px !important;
        }

        .hero__ornament-bottom {
          margin-top: 10px !important;
        }

        .hero__content--holiday .hero__description p {
          font-size: 16px !important;
          line-height: 1.5 !important;
          letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
        }

        .hero__content--holiday-image .hero__description p {
          font-size: 13px !important;
          line-height: 1.46 !important;
          letter-spacing: 1.8px !important;
        }

        .section-header--holiday {
          margin-bottom: 10px !important;
        }

        .section-header__image--holiday img {
          width: 100px !important;
          height: 48px !important;
        }

        .col--holiday.col--two-side .content-title {
          padding-left: 27px !important;
          padding-right: 27px !important;
          font-size: 12px !important;
          line-height: 1.67 !important;
          letter-spacing: 1.6px !important;
        }

        .col__ornament {
          width: 39px !important;
          height: 8px !important;
        }

        .column-container {
          margin-bottom: 40px !important;
        }

        .hero__number a {
          line-height: 30px !important;
        }

        /* Keep if using two column layouts */
        /* //////////////////////////////////// */
        .col--two .content-image,
        .col--two .content-title,
        .col--two .content-description {
          margin-right: 7px !important;
        }

        .col--two.col--last .content-image,
        .col--two.col--last .content-title,

5266364.name: SailthruTEST - Product Email 2
5266364.content_html:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<head>
   <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
   <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
   <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
   <meta name="x-apple-disable-message-reformatting" />
   <title></title>



<style type="text/css" data-premailer="ignore">
   /* Gmail Font Increase Fix */
   /* //////////////////////////////////// */
   .gmailfix {
     display: none;
     display: none !important;
   }

   /* Responsive Media Queries */
   /* //////////////////////////////////// */
   @media only screen and (max-width:600px) {
       img {
         max-width: 100% !important;
         max-height: auto !important;
       }

       .container,
       .container--outline {
         border: none !important;
       }

       .header__logo img {
         width: 200px !important;
         height: 38px !important;
       }

       .section-header__text {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2px !important;
       }

       .col {
         padding-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col .content-image {
         margin-bottom: 5px !important;
       }

       .content-block {
         margin-bottom: 40px !important;
       }

       .icon--plus img {
         width: 23px !important;
         height: auto !important;
       }

       .button__default {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .button__default.button__image-margin {
         margin-bottom: 25px !important;
       }

       .hero__image-container {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .description__text   {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 27px !important;
         margin: 0 25px 20px !important;
       }

       .description__container .description__text {
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .header__nav {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .default-header__image img {
         margin-bottom: 10px !important;
       }

       .email-footer {
         padding: 20px 14px 20px 14px !important;
       }

       .footer__logo img {
         width: 105px !important;
       }

       .social-header {
         padding: 25px 0 15px !important;
         font-size: 10px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-facebook img {
         width: 13px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-instagram img {
         width: 24px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-twitter img {
         width: 30px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-pinterest img {
         width: 19px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-youtube img {
         width: 32px !important;
       }

       .social-icons a {
         margin: 0 15px !important;
       }


       .maker__divider {
         width: 80.2px !important;
         height: 11.3px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using partner header */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .header__partner-logo img {
         max-width: 100% !important;
         height: auto !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using dark hero */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .hero--dark .hero__content {
         margin-left: 27px !important;
         margin-right: 27px !important;
       }

       .hero--dark .hero__headline h1 {
         font-size: 27px !important;
       }

       .hero--dark .hero__description p {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using letter layout hero */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .hero__content--letter {
         margin: 27px 27px 0 27px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using 2017 holiday styles */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .header__logo--holiday img {
         width: 191px !important;
         height: 24px !important;
       }

       .hero__headline--holiday h1 a {
         font-size: 27px !important;
         line-height: 1.3 !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.4px !important;
       }

       .hero__ornament-top {
         width: 184px !important;
         height: 31px !important;
       }

       .hero__ornament-bottom {
         margin-top: 10px !important;
       }

       .hero__content--holiday .hero__description p {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 1.5 !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
       }

       .hero__content--holiday-image .hero__description p {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         line-height: 1.46 !important;
         letter-spacing: 1.8px !important;
       }

       .section-header--holiday {
         margin-bottom: 10px !important;
       }

       .section-header__image--holiday img {
         width: 100px !important;
         height: 48px !important;
       }

       .col--holiday.col--two-side .content-title {
         padding-left: 27px !important;
         padding-right: 27px !important;
         font-size: 12px !important;
         line-height: 1.67 !important;
         letter-spacing: 1.6px !important;
       }

       .col__ornament {
         width: 39px !important;
         height: 8px !important;
       }

       .column-container {
         margin-bottom: 40px !important;
       }

       .hero__number a {
         line-height: 30px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using two column layouts */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .col--two .content-image,
       .col--two .content-title,
       .col--two .content-description {
         margin-right: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--two.col--last .content-image,
       .col--two.col--last .content-title,
       .col--two.col--last .content-description {
         margin-right: 0 !important;
         margin-left: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--two-plus-icon img {
         padding-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col--two-side-alt {
         padding-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-container tr {
         display: block !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-container .col--two {
         width: 100% !important;
         display: block !important;
       }

       .col--two-product .content-image {
         margin-right: 0 !important;
       }

       .col--two-product img {
         width: 100% !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-description {
         margin-left: 15px !important;
         margin-top: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-description a {
         font-size: 15px !important;
       }

       .content-description a {
         line-height: 1.4 !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using four column layouts */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .col--four {
         width: 50% !important;
         padding-bottom: 0 !important;
         margin-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col__space--four {
         display: none !important;
       }

       .col--four .content-image,
       .col--four .content-title,
       .col--four .content-description {
         margin-right: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--four.col--last .content-image,
       .col--four.col--last .content-title,
       .col--four.col--last .content-description {
         margin-right: 0 !important;
         margin-left: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--four-side {
         width: 100% !important;
         padding-bottom: 0 !important;
         margin-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col__inner--four-side,
       .col--last .col__inner--four-side {
         padding: 0 !important;
       }

       .col--four-side .content-image {
         margin-right: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--four-side .content-title,
       .col--four-side .content-description {
         margin: 0 7px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using recipe block */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .recipe__block .default-header__text {
         max-width: 344px !important;
         display: block !important;
         margin: 0 auto !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .content-title {
         padding: 0 18px !important;
         font-size: 15px !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .content-link a {
         font-size: 12px !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .content-image {
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .col__ornament {
         width: 52.2px !important;
         height: 11.2px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using quote block */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .quote {
         padding: 27px 35px !important;
       }

       .quote__marks {
         padding-bottom: 12px !important;
       }

       .quote__marks--bottom {
         padding: 12px 0 0 0 !important;
       }

       .quote__marks img {
         width: 18px !important;
         height: 13px !important;
       }

       .quote__text {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 27px !important;
       }

       .quote__source {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2.4px !important;
         line-height: 16px !important;
         padding-top: 17px !important;
       }

       .quote__source-title {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         line-height: 15px !important;
       }

       .quote__hotline-header {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2.4px !important;
         padding-bottom: 20px !important;
       }

       .quote__block {
         width: auto !important;

            We teamed up with meal-kit service Plated to offer a collection of our go-to recipes along with fresh ingredients, delivered to your door.

      <!-- Button -->
      <table align="center" class="button__default " style="border-collapse: collapse; margin-bottom: 25px; mso-table-lspace: 0pt; mso-table-rspace: 0pt; width: 100%">

             Learn More

                </center>

            </center>

        </tr>
      </table>
      <!-- /Button -->

      <!-- variable image size content block -->
      <table class="content-block" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; color: #666; line-height: 1.5; margin: 0 0 45px; mso-table-lspace: 0pt; mso-table-rspace: 0pt; text-align: center; width: 100%">

    </td>

</table>
<!-- /Supporting Article -->    
    
          
          
                
          
          
            
          
          
          
              
            

<!-- Footer -->

    <a class="social-pinterest" href="http://www.pinterest.com/food52" target="_blank" style="color: #666; margin: 0 20px; text-decoration: none"><img height="30" src="https://media.sailthru.com/3sg/1k2/3/k/5ab13be23b447.png" alt="Pinterest" style="-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic; border: none; height: auto !important; max-height: 30px; max-width: 100%; outline: none; text-decoration: none; width: auto" /></a>

No promo code necessary for gift with purchase. Offer cannot be redeemed for cash-value, combined with other offers, or applied to previous orders. Excluded from all promo codes. </span> <br/>
