<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<head>
   <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
   <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
   <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
   <meta name="x-apple-disable-message-reformatting" />
   <title></title>



<style type="text/css" data-premailer="ignore">
   /* Gmail Font Increase Fix */
   /* //////////////////////////////////// */
   .gmailfix {
     display: none;
     display: none !important;
   }

   /* Responsive Media Queries */
   /* //////////////////////////////////// */
   @media only screen and (max-width:600px) {
       img {
         max-width: 100% !important;
         max-height: auto !important;
       }

       .container,
       .container--outline {
         border: none !important;
       }

       .header__logo img {
         width: 200px !important;
         height: 38px !important;
       }

       .section-header__text {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2px !important;
       }

       .col {
         padding-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col .content-image {
         margin-bottom: 5px !important;
       }

       .content-block {
         margin-bottom: 40px !important;
       }

       .icon--plus img {
         width: 23px !important;
         height: auto !important;
       }

       .button__default {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .button__default.button__image-margin {
         margin-bottom: 25px !important;
       }

       .hero__image-container {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .description__text   {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 27px !important;
         margin: 0 25px 20px !important;
       }

       .description__container .description__text {
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .header__nav {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .default-header__image img {
         margin-bottom: 10px !important;
       }

       .email-footer {
         padding: 20px 14px 20px 14px !important;
       }

       .footer__logo img {
         width: 105px !important;
       }

       .social-header {
         padding: 25px 0 15px !important;
         font-size: 10px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-facebook img {
         width: 13px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-instagram img {
         width: 24px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-twitter img {
         width: 30px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-pinterest img {
         width: 19px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-youtube img {
         width: 32px !important;
       }

       .social-icons a {
         margin: 0 15px !important;
       }


       .maker__divider {
         width: 80.2px !important;
         height: 11.3px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using partner header */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .header__partner-logo img {
         max-width: 100% !important;
         height: auto !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using dark hero */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .hero--dark .hero__content {
         margin-left: 27px !important;
         margin-right: 27px !important;
       }

       .hero--dark .hero__headline h1 {
         font-size: 27px !important;
       }

       .hero--dark .hero__description p {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using letter layout hero */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .hero__content--letter {
         margin: 27px 27px 0 27px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using 2017 holiday styles */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .header__logo--holiday img {
         width: 191px !important;
         height: 24px !important;
       }

       .hero__headline--holiday h1 a {
         font-size: 27px !important;
         line-height: 1.3 !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.4px !important;
       }

       .hero__ornament-top {
         width: 184px !important;
         height: 31px !important;
       }

       .hero__ornament-bottom {
         margin-top: 10px !important;
       }

       .hero__content--holiday .hero__description p {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 1.5 !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
       }

       .hero__content--holiday-image .hero__description p {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         line-height: 1.46 !important;
         letter-spacing: 1.8px !important;
       }

       .section-header--holiday {
         margin-bottom: 10px !important;
       }

       .section-header__image--holiday img {
         width: 100px !important;
         height: 48px !important;
       }

       .col--holiday.col--two-side .content-title {
         padding-left: 27px !important;
         padding-right: 27px !important;
         font-size: 12px !important;
         line-height: 1.67 !important;
         letter-spacing: 1.6px !important;
       }

       .col__ornament {
         width: 39px !important;
         height: 8px !important;
       }

       .column-container {
         margin-bottom: 40px !important;
       }

       .hero__number a {
         line-height: 30px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using two column layouts */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .col--two .content-image,
       .col--two .content-title,
       .col--two .content-description {
         margin-right: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--two.col--last .content-image,
       .col--two.col--last .content-title,
       .col--two.col--last .content-description {
         margin-right: 0 !important;
         margin-left: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--two-plus-icon img {
         padding-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col--two-side-alt {
         padding-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-container tr {
         display: block !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-container .col--two {
         width: 100% !important;
         display: block !important;
       }

       .col--two-product .content-image {
         margin-right: 0 !important;
       }

       .col--two-product img {
         width: 100% !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-description {
         margin-left: 15px !important;
         margin-top: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-description a {
         font-size: 15px !important;
       }

       .content-description a {
         line-height: 1.4 !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using four column layouts */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .col--four {
         width: 50% !important;
         padding-bottom: 0 !important;
         margin-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col__space--four {
         display: none !important;
       }

       .col--four .content-image,
       .col--four .content-title,
       .col--four .content-description {
         margin-right: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--four.col--last .content-image,
       .col--four.col--last .content-title,
       .col--four.col--last .content-description {
         margin-right: 0 !important;
         margin-left: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--four-side {
         width: 100% !important;
         padding-bottom: 0 !important;
         margin-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col__inner--four-side,
       .col--last .col__inner--four-side {
         padding: 0 !important;
       }

       .col--four-side .content-image {
         margin-right: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--four-side .content-title,
       .col--four-side .content-description {
         margin: 0 7px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using recipe block */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .recipe__block .default-header__text {
         max-width: 344px !important;
         display: block !important;
         margin: 0 auto !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .content-title {
         padding: 0 18px !important;
         font-size: 15px !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .content-link a {
         font-size: 12px !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .content-image {
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .col__ornament {
         width: 52.2px !important;
         height: 11.2px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using quote block */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .quote {
         padding: 27px 35px !important;
       }

       .quote__marks {
         padding-bottom: 12px !important;
       }

       .quote__marks--bottom {
         padding: 12px 0 0 0 !important;
       }

       .quote__marks img {
         width: 18px !important;
         height: 13px !important;
       }

       .quote__text {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 27px !important;
       }

       .quote__source {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2.4px !important;
         line-height: 16px !important;
         padding-top: 17px !important;
       }

       .quote__source-title {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         line-height: 15px !important;
       }

       .quote__hotline-header {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2.4px !important;
         padding-bottom: 20px !important;
       }

       .quote__block {
         width: auto !important;
         margin: 0 16px !important;
       }

       .quote__single {
         width: auto !important;
       }

       .quote__single,
       .quote__bio {
         margin: 0 16px 40px 16px !important;
       }

       .quote__single .quote,
       .quote__hotline {
         padding: 25px 30px !important;
       }

       .quote__hotline-link {
         font-size: 13px !important;
       }

       .quote__bio-container {
         display: block !important;
         width: 100% !important;
         margin-bottom: 15px !important;
         padding: 0 !important;
       }

       .quote__bio {
         width: auto !important;
       }

       .quote__text-side {
         display: block !important;
         border-left: none !important;
         width: 100% !important;
         padding: 0 !important;
         text-align: center !important;
       }

       .quote__attribution {
         padding: 25px 30px !important;
       }

       .quote__button-margin {
         margin-bottom: 25px !important;
       }


       /* Keep if Using Headlines */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .headline__large {
         font-size: 32px !important;
         line-height: 41px !important;
         margin: 0px 16px 10px 16px !important;
       }

       .headline__large-margin {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .headline__medium {
         font-size: 26px !important;
         line-height: 32px !important;
         margin: 0px 16px 10px 16px!important;
       }

       .article__header-margin {
         margin-bottom: 17px !important;
       }

       .subtext__medium {
         width: 330px !important;
         font-size: 14px !important;
         line-height: 20px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2.2px !important;
         margin-bottom: 10px !important;
       }

       .subtext__medium-margin {
         margin-bottom: 20px !important;
       }

       .subtext__small {
         max-width: 315px;
         font-size: 11.5px !important;
       }

       .footer__banner img {
         width: 92% !important;
       }

       .headline__medium-margin {
         margin-bottom: 17px !important;
       }

       /* Kepp if Using Product Two Column */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .product-header__text {
         font-size: 11.5px !important;
         letter-spacing: 1.8px !important;
         display: block !important;
         margin: 0 auto !important;
         max-width: 315px !important;
       }

       .product-header__subtext {
         padding-top: 9px !important;
       }

       .product-header__subtext {
         max-width: 344px !important;
         display: block;
         margin: 0 auto;
       }

       .default-header {
         margin-bottom: 17px !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-container {
         margin: 0 16px !important;
       }

       .col--two-product {
         margin-bottom: 10px;
       }

       .col--two .col--two-product .content-image {
         margin-left: 0 !important;
       }

       .col--last .hero__number {
         padding-left: 0 !important;
       }

       /* Three Columns */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .col--three {
         min-width: 109px !important;
       }

       .col__space--three {
         width: 8px !important;
         min-width: 8px !important;
       }

       .col--two-header .col {
         padding-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .col--three-header .col {
         padding-bottom: 0 !important;
       }



       .supporting__article {
         margin-bottom: 0px !important;
       }

       .supporting__article .button__default {
         margin-bottom: 25px !important;
       }

       .supporting__article .full-image {
         margin: 0 16px !important;
       }

       .supporting__article .description__text {
         font-size: 15px !important;
         line-height: 22px !important;
       }

       /* Letter */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .letter__padding td {
         padding: 0 30px !important;
       }

       .letter__container h1 {
         font-size: 32px !important;
         line-height: 41px !important;
       }

       .letter__container p {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 27px !important;
       }

       .letter__container {
         margin-bottom: 0px !important;
       }

       /* Article Two Column*/
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .article__two-column {
         margin: 0 14px 40px 14px !important;
       }

       .article__two-column .col {
         padding-bottom: 20px !important;
       }

       .leaderboard-ad {
         max-width: 343px !important;
       }

       /* Roundup */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .roundup .button__default {
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .roundup .hero__link {
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .roundup .hero__headline h1 {
         font-size: 20px !important;
         line-height: 1.35 !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .roundup .hero__number a {
         font-size: 32px !important;
         line-height: 1.5 !important;
       }

       .roundup-divider {
         max-width: 300px !important;
         border-bottom-width: 40px !important;
       }

       /* Collection */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .collection__backboard {
         width: auto !important;
         max-height: 327px !important;
       }

       .collection__backboard table {
         min-width: 24px !important;
       }

       .collection-image img {
         width: 327px !important;
       }

       .collection__text {
         font-size: 18px !important;
         line-height: 25px !important;
         padding: 20px 24px 20px 60px !important;
       }

       .collection__left {
         padding: 20px 60px 20px 24px !important;

5266383.content_html:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<head>

   <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
   <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
   <meta name="x-apple-disable-message-reformatting" />
   <title></title>



<style type="text/css" data-premailer="ignore">
   /* Gmail Font Increase Fix */
   /* //////////////////////////////////// */
   .gmailfix {
     display: none;
     display: none !important;
   }

   /* Responsive Media Queries */
   /* //////////////////////////////////// */
   @media only screen and (max-width:600px) {
       img {
         max-width: 100% !important;
         max-height: auto !important;
       }

       .container,
       .container--outline {
         border: none !important;
       }

       .header__logo img {
         width: 200px !important;
         height: 38px !important;
       }

       .section-header__text {

         letter-spacing: 2px !important;
       }

       .col {

       }

       .col .content-image {
         margin-bottom: 5px !important;
       }

       .content-block {
         margin-bottom: 40px !important;
       }

       .icon--plus img {

         height: auto !important;
       }

       .button__default {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .button__default.button__image-margin {
         margin-bottom: 25px !important;
       }

       .hero__image-container {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .description__text   {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 27px !important;
         margin: 0 25px 20px !important;
       }

       .description__container .description__text {
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .header__nav {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .default-header__image img {
         margin-bottom: 10px !important;
       }

       .email-footer {
         padding: 20px 14px 20px 14px !important;
       }

       .footer__logo img {
         width: 105px !important;
       }

       .social-header {
         padding: 25px 0 15px !important;
         font-size: 10px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-facebook img {
         width: 13px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-instagram img {
         width: 24px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-twitter img {
         width: 30px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-pinterest img {
         width: 19px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-youtube img {
         width: 32px !important;
       }

       .social-icons a {
         margin: 0 15px !important;
       }


       .maker__divider {
         width: 80.2px !important;
         height: 11.3px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using partner header */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .header__partner-logo img {
         max-width: 100% !important;
         height: auto !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using dark hero */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .hero--dark .hero__content {
         margin-left: 27px !important;
         margin-right: 27px !important;
       }

       .hero--dark .hero__headline h1 {
         font-size: 27px !important;
       }

       .hero--dark .hero__description p {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using letter layout hero */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .hero__content--letter {
         margin: 27px 27px 0 27px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using 2017 holiday styles */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .header__logo--holiday img {
         width: 191px !important;
         height: 24px !important;
       }

         font-size: 27px !important;
         line-height: 1.3 !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.4px !important;
       }

       .hero__ornament-top {
         width: 184px !important;
         height: 31px !important;
       }

       .hero__ornament-bottom {
         margin-top: 10px !important;
       }

       .hero__content--holiday .hero__description p {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 1.5 !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
       }

       .hero__content--holiday-image .hero__description p {

         line-height: 1.46 !important;
         letter-spacing: 1.8px !important;
       }

       .section-header--holiday {

       .section-header__image--holiday img {

         height: 48px !important;

       .col--holiday.col--two-side .content-title {
         padding-left: 27px !important;

         letter-spacing: 1.6px !important;
       }

       .col__ornament {

         height: 8px !important;
       }

       .column-container {
         margin-bottom: 40px !important;
       }

       .hero__number a {

       }

       /* Keep if using two column layouts */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .col--two .content-image,

       }

       .col--two.col--last .content-image,
       .col--two.col--last .content-title,
       .col--two.col--last .content-description {
         margin-right: 0 !important;

       }

       .col--two-plus-icon img {

       }

       .col--two-side-alt {

       .col--two-product-container tr {

       }

       }

       .col--two-product img {

       }

       .col--two-product-description {
         margin-left: 15px !important;
         margin-top: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-description a {

       }

       .content-description a {
         line-height: 1.4 !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using four column layouts */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .col--four {
         width: 50% !important;
         padding-bottom: 0 !important;
         margin-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col__space--four {
         display: none !important;
       }

       .col--four .content-image,
       .col--four .content-title,
       .col--four .content-description {
         margin-right: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--four.col--last .content-image,
       .col--four.col--last .content-title,
       .col--four.col--last .content-description {
         margin-right: 0 !important;
         margin-left: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--four-side {
         width: 100% !important;
         padding-bottom: 0 !important;
         margin-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col__inner--four-side,
       .col--last .col__inner--four-side {

       }

       .col--four-side .content-image {
         margin-right: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--four-side .content-title,
       .col--four-side .content-description {
         margin: 0 7px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using recipe block */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .recipe__block .default-header__text {
         max-width: 344px !important;
         display: block !important;
         margin: 0 auto !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .content-title {
         padding: 0 18px !important;
         font-size: 15px !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .content-link a {
         font-size: 12px !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .content-image {
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .col__ornament {
         width: 52.2px !important;
         height: 11.2px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using quote block */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .quote {
         padding: 27px 35px !important;
       }

       .quote__marks {
         padding-bottom: 12px !important;
       }

       .quote__marks--bottom {
         padding: 12px 0 0 0 !important;
       }

       .quote__marks img {
         width: 18px !important;
         height: 13px !important;
       }

       .quote__text {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 27px !important;
       }

       .quote__source {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2.4px !important;
         line-height: 16px !important;
         padding-top: 17px !important;
       }

       .quote__source-title {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         line-height: 15px !important;
       }

       .quote__hotline-header {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2.4px !important;
         padding-bottom: 20px !important;
       }

       .quote__block {
         width: auto !important;
         margin: 0 16px !important;
       }

       .quote__single {
         width: auto !important;
       }

       .quote__single,
       .quote__bio {
         margin: 0 16px 40px 16px !important;
       }

       .quote__single .quote,
       .quote__hotline {
         padding: 25px 30px !important;
       }

       .quote__hotline-link {
         font-size: 13px !important;
       }

       .quote__bio-container {
         display: block !important;
         width: 100% !important;
         margin-bottom: 15px !important;
         padding: 0 !important;
       }

       .quote__bio {
         width: auto !important;
       }

       .quote__text-side {
         display: block !important;
         border-left: none !important;
         width: 100% !important;
         padding: 0 !important;
         text-align: center !important;
       }

       .quote__attribution {
         padding: 25px 30px !important;
       }

       .quote__button-margin {
         margin-bottom: 25px !important;
       }


       /* Keep if Using Headlines */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .headline__large {
         font-size: 32px !important;
         line-height: 41px !important;
         margin: 0px 16px 10px 16px !important;
       }

       .headline__large-margin {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .headline__medium {
         font-size: 26px !important;
         line-height: 32px !important;
         margin: 0px 16px 10px 16px!important;
       }

       .article__header-margin {
         margin-bottom: 17px !important;
       }

       .subtext__medium {
         width: 330px !important;

       .subtext__medium-margin {

       }

       .subtext__small {

         font-size: 11.5px !important;
       }

       .footer__banner img {

       .headline__medium-margin {
         margin-bottom: 17px !important;

       /* Kepp if Using Product Two Column */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .col--last .hero__number {

       /* Three Columns */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .col--three {

       .col__space--three {

       .supporting__article {

       /* Letter */

       /* Article Two Column*/

       .leaderboard-ad {

       /* Roundup */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .roundup .button__default {

       .roundup .hero__link {

       .roundup .hero__headline h1 {

       /* Collection */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .collection__backboard {

       }

       .collection__backboard table {

       }

       /* Three Article */

            <td class="quote__marks quote__marks--bottom" align="center" style="border-collapse: collapse; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; padding: 16px 0 0">
              <img src="https://media.sailthru.com/3sg/1k2/3/6/5a9ee7c191036.png" border="0" width="32" height="23" alt="" style="-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic; height: auto !important; max-width: 100%; outline: none; text-decoration: none; width: 32px" />
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td class="quote__hotline-link" align="center" style="border-collapse: collapse; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 500; letter-spacing: 1.6px; padding: 25px 0 0; text-transform: uppercase"><a href="https://food52.com/hotline/40437" style="color: #ab967d; text-decoration: none">See The Answers <img src="https://media.sailthru.com/3sg/1k2/3/6/5a9ee77bb6376.png" width="5" height="15" style="-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic; border: none; height: auto !important; max-width: 100%; outline: none; text-decoration: none" /></a></td>
          </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
    </td>
  </tr>
</table>
<!-- /Quote w/ Hotline -->
				  
			
		
		
				  
				  
				  
		
				  
						  

<!-- Footer -->
<div class="email-footer" style="background: #f7f7f7; color: #909090; font-size: 10px; line-height: 15px; padding: 30px 14px; text-align: center" align="center">
  <a href="http://food52.com/" title="Food52" target="_blank" style="color: #666; text-decoration: none">
    <img src="https://media.sailthru.com/3sg/1k2/3/6/5a9ee70d47735.png" alt="Food52" width="212" height="40" style="-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic; border: none; height: auto !important; max-width: 100%; outline: none; text-decoration: none; width: 120px" />
  </a>
  <div class="social-header" style="color: #57696d; font-size: 12px; letter-spacing: 1.5px; padding: 30px 0 20px; text-transform: uppercase">Follow Us</div>
  <div class="social-icons" style="padding: 0 0 25px">
    <a class="social-facebook" href="https://www.facebook.com/food52" target="_blank" style="color: #666; margin: 0 20px; text-decoration: none"><img height="30" src="https://media.sailthru.com/3sg/1k2/3/k/5ab13bb651eae.png" alt="Facebook" style="-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic; border: none; height: auto !important; max-height: 30px; max-width: 100%; outline: none; text-decoration: none; width: auto" /></a>
    <a class="social-instagram" href="http://instagram.com/food52" target="_blank" style="color: #666; margin: 0 20px; text-decoration: none"><img height="30" src="https://media.sailthru.com/3sg/1k2/3/k/5ab13bd001932.png" alt="Instagram" style="-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic; border: none; height: auto !important; max-height: 30px; max-width: 100%; outline: none; text-decoration: none; width: auto" /></a>
    <a class="social-twitter" href="https://twitter.com/food52" target="_blank" style="color: #666; margin: 0 20px; text-decoration: none"><img height="30" src="https://media.sailthru.com/3sg/1k2/3/k/5ab13bf0b0eb2.png" alt="Twitter" style="-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic; border: none; height: auto !important; max-height: 30px; max-width: 100%; outline: none; text-decoration: none; width: auto" /></a>
    <a class="social-pinterest" href="http://www.pinterest.com/food52" target="_blank" style="color: #666; margin: 0 20px; text-decoration: none"><img height="30" src="https://media.sailthru.com/3sg/1k2/3/k/5ab13be23b447.png" alt="Pinterest" style="-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic; border: none; height: auto !important; max-height: 30px; max-width: 100%; outline: none; text-decoration: none; width: auto" /></a>
    <a class="social-youtube" href="https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfFI8jIjvIApUACJ3qjax2w" target="_blank" style="color: #666; margin: 0 20px; text-decoration: none"><img height="30" src="https://media.sailthru.com/3sg/1k2/4/i/5ad75de37aa1d.png" alt="YouTube" style="-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic; border: none; height: auto !important; max-height: 30px; max-width: 100%; outline: none; text-decoration: none; width: auto" /></a>
  </div>
  <div class="footer-text">
	  <span style="line-height:normal !important;">*Discount price as marked on the <a href="https://food52.com/shop/products/5367" style="color: #ab967d; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: none">Fresh Alba White Truffle</a>, only. Offer valid until 11/20/2018 at 11:59pm ET. Truffles ship overnight when ready, Monday through Thursday, only. Shipping surcharge still applies. Valid in the U.S. only on in stock items only, while supplies last. Cannot be redeemed for cash or applied to previous orders. </span> <br/> 
	  <br/>

     {date(yyy)} Food52. All Rights Reserved.

    122 West 26th Street, 8th Floor, New York, NY 10001
  </div>
	    {beacon}
</div>
<!-- /Footer -->
				  
				  

				  
				  <img src="https://bounceexchange.com/tag/em/2362.gif" width=1 height=1 border=0 />

				  

                <!-- ********************************* -->
              </td>
            </tr>

  </center>
  <!-- Fix for unwanted font increases in gmail. KEEP THIS / DONT ALTER -->

5266412.name: SailthruTEST - Friday Digest
5266412.content_html:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<head>
   <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
   <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
   <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
   <meta name="x-apple-disable-message-reformatting" />
   <title></title>



<style type="text/css" data-premailer="ignore">
   /* Gmail Font Increase Fix */
   /* //////////////////////////////////// */
   .gmailfix {
     display: none;
     display: none !important;
   }

   /* Responsive Media Queries */
   /* //////////////////////////////////// */
   @media only screen and (max-width:600px) {
       img {
         max-width: 100% !important;
         max-height: auto !important;
       }

       .container,
       .container--outline {
         border: none !important;
       }

       .header__logo img {
         width: 200px !important;
         height: 38px !important;
       }

       .section-header__text {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2px !important;
       }

       .col {
         padding-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col .content-image {
         margin-bottom: 5px !important;
       }

       .content-block {
         margin-bottom: 40px !important;
       }

       .icon--plus img {
         width: 23px !important;
         height: auto !important;
       }

       .button__default {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .button__default.button__image-margin {
         margin-bottom: 25px !important;
       }

       .hero__image-container {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .description__text   {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 27px !important;
         margin: 0 25px 20px !important;
       }

       .description__container .description__text {
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .header__nav {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .default-header__image img {
         margin-bottom: 10px !important;
       }

       .email-footer {
         padding: 20px 14px 20px 14px !important;
       }

       .footer__logo img {
         width: 105px !important;
       }

       .social-header {
         padding: 25px 0 15px !important;
         font-size: 10px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-facebook img {
         width: 13px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-instagram img {
         width: 24px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-twitter img {
         width: 30px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-pinterest img {
         width: 19px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-youtube img {
         width: 32px !important;
       }

       .social-icons a {
         margin: 0 15px !important;
       }


       .maker__divider {
         width: 80.2px !important;
         height: 11.3px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using partner header */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .header__partner-logo img {
         max-width: 100% !important;
         height: auto !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using dark hero */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .hero--dark .hero__content {
         margin-left: 27px !important;
         margin-right: 27px !important;
       }

       .hero--dark .hero__headline h1 {
         font-size: 27px !important;
       }

       .hero--dark .hero__description p {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using letter layout hero */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .hero__content--letter {
         margin: 27px 27px 0 27px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using 2017 holiday styles */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .header__logo--holiday img {
         width: 191px !important;
         height: 24px !important;
       }

       .hero__headline--holiday h1 a {
         font-size: 27px !important;
         line-height: 1.3 !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.4px !important;
       }

       .hero__ornament-top {
         width: 184px !important;
         height: 31px !important;
       }

       .hero__ornament-bottom {
         margin-top: 10px !important;
       }

       .hero__content--holiday .hero__description p {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 1.5 !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
       }

       .hero__content--holiday-image .hero__description p {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         line-height: 1.46 !important;
         letter-spacing: 1.8px !important;
       }

       .section-header--holiday {
         margin-bottom: 10px !important;
       }

       .section-header__image--holiday img {
         width: 100px !important;
         height: 48px !important;
       }

       .col--holiday.col--two-side .content-title {
         padding-left: 27px !important;
         padding-right: 27px !important;
         font-size: 12px !important;
         line-height: 1.67 !important;
         letter-spacing: 1.6px !important;
       }

       .col__ornament {
         width: 39px !important;
         height: 8px !important;
       }

       .column-container {
         margin-bottom: 40px !important;
       }

       .hero__number a {
         line-height: 30px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using two column layouts */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .col--two .content-image,
       .col--two .content-title,
       .col--two .content-description {
         margin-right: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--two.col--last .content-image,
       .col--two.col--last .content-title,
       .col--two.col--last .content-description {
         margin-right: 0 !important;
         margin-left: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--two-plus-icon img {
         padding-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col--two-side-alt {
         padding-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-container tr {
         display: block !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-container .col--two {
         width: 100% !important;
         display: block !important;
       }

       .col--two-product .content-image {
         margin-right: 0 !important;
       }

       .col--two-product img {
         width: 100% !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-description {
         margin-left: 15px !important;
         margin-top: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-description a {
         font-size: 15px !important;
       }

       .content-description a {
         line-height: 1.4 !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using four column layouts */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .col--four {
         width: 50% !important;
         padding-bottom: 0 !important;
         margin-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col__space--four {
         display: none !important;
       }

       .col--four .content-image,
       .col--four .content-title,
       .col--four .content-description {
         margin-right: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--four.col--last .content-image,
       .col--four.col--last .content-title,
       .col--four.col--last .content-description {
         margin-right: 0 !important;
         margin-left: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--four-side {
         width: 100% !important;
         padding-bottom: 0 !important;
         margin-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col__inner--four-side,
       .col--last .col__inner--four-side {
         padding: 0 !important;
       }

       .col--four-side .content-image {
         margin-right: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--four-side .content-title,
       .col--four-side .content-description {
         margin: 0 7px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using recipe block */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .recipe__block .default-header__text {
         max-width: 344px !important;
         display: block !important;
         margin: 0 auto !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .content-title {
         padding: 0 18px !important;
         font-size: 15px !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .content-link a {
         font-size: 12px !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .content-image {
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .col__ornament {
         width: 52.2px !important;
         height: 11.2px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using quote block */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .quote {
         padding: 27px 35px !important;
       }

       .quote__marks {
         padding-bottom: 12px !important;
       }

       .quote__marks--bottom {
         padding: 12px 0 0 0 !important;
       }

       .quote__marks img {
         width: 18px !important;
         height: 13px !important;
       }

       .quote__text {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 27px !important;
       }

       .quote__source {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2.4px !important;
         line-height: 16px !important;
         padding-top: 17px !important;
       }

       .quote__source-title {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         line-height: 15px !important;
       }

       .quote__hotline-header {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2.4px !important;
         padding-bottom: 20px !important;
       }

       .quote__block {
         width: auto !important;
         margin: 0 16px !important;
       }

       .quote__single {
         width: auto !important;
       }

       .quote__single,
       .quote__bio {
         margin: 0 16px 40px 16px !important;
       }

       .quote__single .quote,
       .quote__hotline {
         padding: 25px 30px !important;
       }

       .quote__hotline-link {
         font-size: 13px !important;
       }

       .quote__bio-container {
         display: block !important;
         width: 100% !important;
         margin-bottom: 15px !important;
         padding: 0 !important;
       }

       .quote__bio {
         width: auto !important;
       }

       .quote__text-side {
         display: block !important;
         border-left: none !important;
         width: 100% !important;
         padding: 0 !important;
         text-align: center !important;
       }

       .quote__attribution {
         padding: 25px 30px !important;
       }

       .quote__button-margin {
         margin-bottom: 25px !important;
       }


       /* Keep if Using Headlines */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .headline__large {
         font-size: 32px !important;
         line-height: 41px !important;
         margin: 0px 16px 10px 16px !important;
       }

       .headline__large-margin {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .headline__medium {
         font-size: 26px !important;
         line-height: 32px !important;
         margin: 0px 16px 10px 16px!important;
       }

       .article__header-margin {
         margin-bottom: 17px !important;
       }

       .subtext__medium {
         width: 330px !important;
         font-size: 14px !important;
         line-height: 20px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2.2px !important;
         margin-bottom: 10px !important;
       }

       .subtext__medium-margin {
         margin-bottom: 20px !important;
       }

       .subtext__small {
         max-width: 315px;
         font-size: 11.5px !important;
       }

       .footer__banner img {

       }

       .headline__medium-margin {
         margin-bottom: 17px !important;
       }

       /* Kepp if Using Product Two Column */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .product-header__text {

       .col--two-product-container {

       .col--two-product {
         margin-bottom: 10px;
       }

       .col--two .col--two-product .content-image {

       .col--last .hero__number {

       /* Three Columns */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .col--three {
         min-width: 109px !important;
       }

       .col__space--three {
         width: 8px !important;

       .col--two-header .col {

       }



       .supporting__article {

       .supporting__article .full-image {

       }

       .supporting__article .description__text {

       /* Letter */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .letter__padding td {

       .letter__container h1 {
         font-size: 32px !important;
         line-height: 41px !important;
       }

       .letter__container p {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 27px !important;
       }

       .letter__container {
         margin-bottom: 0px !important;
       }

       /* Article Two Column*/
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .article__two-column {
         margin: 0 14px 40px 14px !important;
       }

       .article__two-column .col {
         padding-bottom: 20px !important;
       }

       .leaderboard-ad {
         max-width: 343px !important;
       }

       /* Roundup */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .roundup .button__default {
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .roundup .hero__link {
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .roundup .hero__headline h1 {

       }

       .roundup-divider {

       }

       /* Collection */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .collection__backboard {
         width: auto !important;
         max-height: 327px !important;
       }

       .collection__backboard table {
         min-width: 24px !important;
       }

       .collection-image img {
         width: 327px !important;
       }

       .collection__text {
         font-size: 18px !important;

       .collection__subtext {

       /* Three Article */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .article__three-spacer {

       }

       .article__three .content-description a {

       }

       .article__three .content-image {

       }

       /* Secondary Products */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .secondary__products.column-container {
         padding: 25px 16px !important;
       }

       .secondary__products .column-header {
         padding-bottom: 17px !important;
       }

       .secondary__products .content-image {

       }

       .secondary__products .col--two .content-image {

       .secondary__products .col--two .content-description a {

       .secondary__products .col--two.col--last .content-image,
       .secondary__products .col--two.col--last .content-description {
         margin-left: 3.5px !important;
         margin-right: 0 !important;

       .article__three-block {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

      .secondary__products.secondary__products-one .button__default {
        margin-bottom: 0 !important;
      }

      .secondary__products.secondary__products-one .col--two .content-image {
        margin-right: 0 !important;
      }

      .secondary__products.secondary__products-one .col--two {
        padding-bottom: 0 !important;
      }

       /* Genius Footer Banner Styles */
       /* ///////////////////////////////////// */

       .genius__footer {

       }

       .genius__footer-header {
         margin-top: 22px !important;
       }

       .genius__footer-dek {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         padding: 10px 26px 22px 26px !important;
       }

       .section-divider {

       }

       .default-header__image .divider__margin {

       }

       .subtext__small-container {

         margin: 0 auto 11px auto !important;
       }

       .article__two-column .content-description a {
         font-size: 15px !important;
       }

       .article__three-block .content-description {
         padding-right: 15px !important;
       }

       .roundup__headline {
         max-width: 300px !important;
       }

       /* Sponsor 2x Email */
       /* ////////////////// */
       .sponsor__link {
         padding: 15px 0 0 !important;
       }

       .sponsor__link a {
         font-size: 13px !important;
       }

       /* Nav w/ Banner */
       /* ////////////////// */
       .nav__banner a {
         font-size: 12px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2.8px !important;
         padding: 13px 0 12px 0 !important;
       }

       /* 2018 Holiday Icons */
       .roundup__holiday img {
         margin-bottom: 35px !important;
         width: 55.8px !important;
       }

</table>
<!-- /Supporting Article -->    
    
          
          <!-- Supporting Article -->
<table width="100%" class="supporting__article content-block" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; color: #666; margin: 0 0 0px; mso-table-lspace: 0pt; mso-table-rspace: 0pt; text-align: center; width: 100%">
  <tr>
    <td cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; padding: 0">

      <!-- Holiday Divider -->

        <tr>

            <img src="https://media.sailthru.com/3sg/1k2/9/e/5b9c1be2abf3e.png" border="0" width="98" height="auto" alt="" style="-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic; border:none; height: auto !important; margin-bottom: 12px; max-width: 100%; outline: none; text-decoration: none" />
          </td>
        </tr>
      </table>
      <table class="divider-default" width="38" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" align="center" style="border-collapse: collapse; mso-table-lspace: 0pt; mso-table-rspace: 0pt; text-align: center; width: 38px; margin: 0 auto 10px auto;">
        <tr>

          </td>

      <!-- /Holiday Divider -->

      <table class="headline__text" style="border-collapse: collapse; color: #555555; font-family: Georgia, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 38px; line-height: 47px; mso-table-lspace: 0pt; mso-table-rspace: 0pt; text-align: center; width: 100%">
        <tr>
          <td style="border-collapse: collapse; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; padding: 0">
            <div class="headline__medium headline__medium-article" style="font-family: Georgia, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 26px; line-height: 32px; margin-bottom: 12px">
         Dinner, Solved
            </div>

        </tr>
      </table>
      <!-- Description Text Block -->
      <table align="center" class="description" style="border-collapse: collapse; mso-table-lspace: 0pt; mso-table-rspace: 0pt; width: 100%">
        <tr>
          <td style="border-collapse: collapse; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; padding: 0">
            <div class="description__text text-small" style="color: #555555; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 300; letter-spacing: 0.8px; line-height: 23px; margin: 0 35px 20px; text-align: center" align="center">
            We teamed up with meal-kit service Plated to offer a collection of our go-to recipes along with fresh ingredients, delivered to your door.

      <!-- /Description Text Block -->

      <!-- Button -->

             Learn More
              </a>
              <!--[if mso]>
                </center>
              </v:roundrect>
            <![endif]--></div>
            </center>
          </td>

      </table>
      <!-- /Button -->

      <!-- variable image size content block -->

5266482.content_html:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<head>
   <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
   <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
   <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
   <meta name="x-apple-disable-message-reformatting" />
   <title></title>



<style type="text/css" data-premailer="ignore">
   /* Gmail Font Increase Fix */
   /* //////////////////////////////////// */
   .gmailfix {
     display: none;
     display: none !important;
   }

   /* Responsive Media Queries */
   /* //////////////////////////////////// */
   @media only screen and (max-width:600px) {
       img {
         max-width: 100% !important;
         max-height: auto !important;
       }

       .container,
       .container--outline {
         border: none !important;
       }

       .header__logo img {
         width: 200px !important;
         height: 38px !important;
       }

       .section-header__text {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2px !important;
       }

       .col {
         padding-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col .content-image {
         margin-bottom: 5px !important;
       }

       .content-block {
         margin-bottom: 40px !important;
       }

       .icon--plus img {
         width: 23px !important;
         height: auto !important;
       }

       .button__default {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .button__default.button__image-margin {
         margin-bottom: 25px !important;
       }

       .hero__image-container {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .description__text   {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 27px !important;
         margin: 0 25px 20px !important;
       }

       .description__container .description__text {
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .header__nav {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .default-header__image img {
         margin-bottom: 10px !important;
       }

       .email-footer {
         padding: 20px 14px 20px 14px !important;
       }

       .footer__logo img {
         width: 105px !important;
       }

       .social-header {
         padding: 25px 0 15px !important;
         font-size: 10px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-facebook img {
         width: 13px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-instagram img {
         width: 24px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-twitter img {
         width: 30px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-pinterest img {
         width: 19px !important;
       }

       .social-icons .social-youtube img {
         width: 32px !important;
       }

       .social-icons a {
         margin: 0 15px !important;
       }


       .maker__divider {
         width: 80.2px !important;
         height: 11.3px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using partner header */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .header__partner-logo img {
         max-width: 100% !important;
         height: auto !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using dark hero */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .hero--dark .hero__content {
         margin-left: 27px !important;
         margin-right: 27px !important;
       }

       .hero--dark .hero__headline h1 {
         font-size: 27px !important;
       }

       .hero--dark .hero__description p {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using letter layout hero */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .hero__content--letter {
         margin: 27px 27px 0 27px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using 2017 holiday styles */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .header__logo--holiday img {
         width: 191px !important;
         height: 24px !important;
       }

       .hero__headline--holiday h1 a {
         font-size: 27px !important;
         line-height: 1.3 !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.4px !important;
       }

       .hero__ornament-top {
         width: 184px !important;
         height: 31px !important;
       }

       .hero__ornament-bottom {
         margin-top: 10px !important;
       }

       .hero__content--holiday .hero__description p {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 1.5 !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
       }

       .hero__content--holiday-image .hero__description p {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         line-height: 1.46 !important;
         letter-spacing: 1.8px !important;
       }

       .section-header--holiday {
         margin-bottom: 10px !important;
       }

       .section-header__image--holiday img {
         width: 100px !important;
         height: 48px !important;
       }

       .col--holiday.col--two-side .content-title {
         padding-left: 27px !important;
         padding-right: 27px !important;
         font-size: 12px !important;
         line-height: 1.67 !important;
         letter-spacing: 1.6px !important;
       }

       .col__ornament {
         width: 39px !important;
         height: 8px !important;
       }

       .column-container {
         margin-bottom: 40px !important;
       }

       .hero__number a {
         line-height: 30px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using two column layouts */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .col--two .content-image,
       .col--two .content-title,
       .col--two .content-description {
         margin-right: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--two.col--last .content-image,
       .col--two.col--last .content-title,
       .col--two.col--last .content-description {
         margin-right: 0 !important;
         margin-left: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--two-plus-icon img {
         padding-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col--two-side-alt {
         padding-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-container tr {
         display: block !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-container .col--two {
         width: 100% !important;
         display: block !important;
       }

       .col--two-product .content-image {
         margin-right: 0 !important;
       }

       .col--two-product img {
         width: 100% !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-description {
         margin-left: 15px !important;
         margin-top: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-description a {
         font-size: 15px !important;
       }

       .content-description a {
         line-height: 1.4 !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using four column layouts */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .col--four {
         width: 50% !important;
         padding-bottom: 0 !important;
         margin-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col__space--four {
         display: none !important;
       }

       .col--four .content-image,
       .col--four .content-title,
       .col--four .content-description {
         margin-right: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--four.col--last .content-image,
       .col--four.col--last .content-title,
       .col--four.col--last .content-description {
         margin-right: 0 !important;
         margin-left: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--four-side {
         width: 100% !important;
         padding-bottom: 0 !important;
         margin-bottom: 15px !important;
       }

       .col__inner--four-side,
       .col--last .col__inner--four-side {
         padding: 0 !important;
       }

       .col--four-side .content-image {
         margin-right: 7px !important;
       }

       .col--four-side .content-title,
       .col--four-side .content-description {
         margin: 0 7px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using recipe block */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .recipe__block .default-header__text {
         max-width: 344px !important;
         display: block !important;
         margin: 0 auto !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .content-title {
         padding: 0 18px !important;
         font-size: 15px !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .content-link a {
         font-size: 12px !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .content-image {
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .recipe__block .col__ornament {
         width: 52.2px !important;
         height: 11.2px !important;
       }

       /* Keep if using quote block */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .quote {
         padding: 27px 35px !important;
       }

       .quote__marks {
         padding-bottom: 12px !important;
       }

       .quote__marks--bottom {
         padding: 12px 0 0 0 !important;
       }

       .quote__marks img {
         width: 18px !important;
         height: 13px !important;
       }

       .quote__text {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 27px !important;
       }

       .quote__source {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2.4px !important;
         line-height: 16px !important;
         padding-top: 17px !important;
       }

       .quote__source-title {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         line-height: 15px !important;
       }

       .quote__hotline-header {
         font-size: 13px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2.4px !important;
         padding-bottom: 20px !important;
       }

       .quote__block {
         width: auto !important;
         margin: 0 16px !important;
       }

       .quote__single {
         width: auto !important;
       }

       .quote__single,
       .quote__bio {
         margin: 0 16px 40px 16px !important;
       }

       .quote__single .quote,
       .quote__hotline {
         padding: 25px 30px !important;
       }

       .quote__hotline-link {
         font-size: 13px !important;
       }

       .quote__bio-container {
         display: block !important;
         width: 100% !important;
         margin-bottom: 15px !important;
         padding: 0 !important;
       }

       .quote__bio {
         width: auto !important;
       }

       .quote__text-side {
         display: block !important;
         border-left: none !important;
         width: 100% !important;
         padding: 0 !important;
         text-align: center !important;
       }

       .quote__attribution {
         padding: 25px 30px !important;
       }

       .quote__button-margin {
         margin-bottom: 25px !important;
       }


       /* Keep if Using Headlines */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .headline__large {
         font-size: 32px !important;
         line-height: 41px !important;
         margin: 0px 16px 10px 16px !important;
       }

       .headline__large-margin {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .headline__medium {
         font-size: 26px !important;
         line-height: 32px !important;
         margin: 0px 16px 10px 16px!important;
       }

       .article__header-margin {
         margin-bottom: 17px !important;
       }

       .subtext__medium {
         width: 330px !important;
         font-size: 14px !important;
         line-height: 20px !important;
         letter-spacing: 2.2px !important;
         margin-bottom: 10px !important;
       }

       .subtext__medium-margin {
         margin-bottom: 20px !important;
       }

       .subtext__small {
         max-width: 315px;
         font-size: 11.5px !important;
       }

       .footer__banner img {
         width: 92% !important;
       }

       .headline__medium-margin {
         margin-bottom: 17px !important;
       }

       /* Kepp if Using Product Two Column */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .product-header__text {
         font-size: 11.5px !important;
         letter-spacing: 1.8px !important;
         display: block !important;
         margin: 0 auto !important;
         max-width: 315px !important;
       }

       .product-header__subtext {
         padding-top: 9px !important;
       }

       .product-header__subtext {
         max-width: 344px !important;
         display: block;
         margin: 0 auto;
       }

       .default-header {
         margin-bottom: 17px !important;
       }

       .col--two-product-container {
         margin: 0 16px !important;
       }

       .col--two-product {
         margin-bottom: 10px;
       }

       .col--two .col--two-product .content-image {
         margin-left: 0 !important;
       }

       .col--last .hero__number {
         padding-left: 0 !important;
       }

       /* Three Columns */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .col--three {
         min-width: 109px !important;
       }

       .col__space--three {
         width: 8px !important;
         min-width: 8px !important;
       }

       .col--two-header .col {
         padding-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

       .col--three-header .col {
         padding-bottom: 0 !important;
       }



       .supporting__article {
         margin-bottom: 0px !important;
       }

       .supporting__article .button__default {
         margin-bottom: 25px !important;
       }

       .supporting__article .full-image {
         margin: 0 16px !important;
       }

       .supporting__article .description__text {
         font-size: 15px !important;
         line-height: 22px !important;
       }

       /* Letter */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .letter__padding td {
         padding: 0 30px !important;
       }

       .letter__container h1 {
         font-size: 32px !important;
         line-height: 41px !important;
       }

       .letter__container p {
         font-size: 16px !important;
         line-height: 27px !important;
       }

       .letter__container {
         margin-bottom: 0px !important;
       }

       /* Article Two Column*/
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .article__two-column {
         margin: 0 14px 40px 14px !important;
       }

       .article__two-column .col {
         padding-bottom: 20px !important;
       }

       .leaderboard-ad {
         max-width: 343px !important;
       }

       /* Roundup */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */
       .roundup .button__default {
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .roundup .hero__link {
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .roundup .hero__headline h1 {
         font-size: 20px !important;
         line-height: 1.35 !important;
         letter-spacing: 0.8px !important;
         margin-bottom: 0 !important;
       }

       .roundup .hero__number a {
         font-size: 32px !important;
         line-height: 1.5 !important;
       }

       .roundup-divider {
         max-width: 300px !important;
         border-bottom-width: 40px !important;
       }

       /* Collection */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .collection__backboard {
         width: auto !important;
         max-height: 327px !important;
       }

       .collection__backboard table {
         min-width: 24px !important;
       }

       .collection-image img {
         width: 327px !important;
       }

       .collection__text {
         font-size: 18px !important;
         line-height: 25px !important;
         padding: 20px 24px 20px 60px !important;
       }

       .collection__left {
         padding: 20px 60px 20px 24px !important;
       }

       .collection__subtext {
         padding-top: 10px !important;
       }

       /* Three Article */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .article__three-spacer {
         margin: 0 16px !important;
       }

       .article__three .content-description a {
         font-size: 15px !important;
         line-height:  1.4 !important;
       }

       .article__three .content-image {
         padding: 0 !important;
       }

       .article__three .col--two-side {
         padding-bottom: 10px !important;
       }

       /* Secondary Products */
       /* //////////////////////////////////// */

       .secondary__products.column-container {
         padding: 25px 16px !important;
       }

       .secondary__products .column-header {
         padding-bottom: 17px !important;
       }

       .secondary__products .content-image {
         margin-bottom: 10px !important;
         margin-right: 0 !important;
       }

       .secondary__products .content-description a {
         font-size: 15px !important;
         margin-right: 0 !important;
       }

       .secondary__products .col--two-header .col {
         padding-bottom: 20px !important;
       }

       .secondary__products .content-description a {
         line-height: 1.4 !important;
       }

       .secondary__products .col--two .content-image {
         margin-right: 4.5px !important;
       }

       .secondary__products .col--two .content-description a {
         margin-right: 4.5px !important;
       }

       .secondary__products .col--two.col--last .content-image,
       .secondary__products .col--two.col--last .content-description {
         margin-left: 3.5px !important;
         margin-right: 0 !important;
       }

       .article__three-block {
         margin-bottom: 30px !important;
       }

      .secondary__products.secondary__products-one .button__default {
        margin-bottom: 0 !important;
      }

      .secondary__products.secondary__products-one .col--two .content-image {
        margin-right: 0 !important;
      }

      .secondary__products.secondary__products-one .col--two {
        padding-bottom: 0 !important;
      }

       /* Genius Footer Banner Styles */
       /* ///////////////////////////////////// */

       .genius__footer {
         margin: 0 16px 40px 16px !important;
       }

       .genius__footer-header {
         margin-top: 22px !important;
       }

       .genius__footer-dek {
